extendedInfo.description: DraStic is a fast Nintendo DS emulator for Android. In addition to being able to play Nintendo DS games full speed on many Android devices it has the following features:- Customize the placement and size of the DS screens, for portrait and landscape modes- Fully supports add-on controllers, and physical controls in devices like nVidia Shield and Xperia Play- Save and resume your progress anywhere with save states- Tweak your gaming experience with a database of thousands of cheat codes- Synchronize your save games with your online Google Drive space- Increase emulation speed with fast-forwardIf you have any uncertainties about the emulator please check out the demo version first, which will let you evaluate how the emulator works on your device.DraStic is only intended for play of private backups of legally acquired Nintendo DS games. This product is not affiliated with or endorsed by Nintendo in any way. Do not ask us for ROMs or help getting them - any request will be ignored.NOTE: Android devices using Tegra 2 are not supported by this emulator. We've attempted to blacklist these devices, but if you still have one that is not blacklisted do not purchase this emulator.If you need assistance please e-mail us at drastic.ds@gmail.com

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Best out there. Can I request that fast forward speeds can be controlled? Like maybe a 2x, 4x, etc options? When I fast forward on the HTC One, it goes waaaay too fast. Otherwise, perfect!
reviews.author: Joseph Hindy

reviews.title: Works great and love it but controls need better work
reviews.comment: I want to use this in portrait with better controls. Otherwise it\'s perfect
reviews.author: John Doe

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: That\'s a great emulator! The best so far! All the games I already tested didn\'t have a single lag! Loved it! Keep it up!
reviews.author: Munir Wanis

reviews.title: Great emulator!
reviews.comment: Works best on my Nexus 7 because of the dual screen, but phones can definitely handle it too. No performance issues and great options and features. Well worth your time. Great job, devs!
reviews.author: Adam Dallimore

reviews.title: Run amazingly!
reviews.comment: Fasted emulator I\'ve ever used, didn\'t have to mess with the settings either. Emulators on my PC don\'t even run this well! Definitely worth 8$
reviews.author: Benessa Bowen

reviews.title: Digimon DS
reviews.comment: The game Digimon DS stops working on the emulator none of the controls work after playing the game for a certain amount of time once you enter game dialogue can you please fix this or help get by this thanks
reviews.author: Michael Tolentino

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: Try the demo... And buy this game...  Pokemon b n w also bnw 2 worki g perfecly... Cheats also working...  Amazing work... I hope we can link to another phone...  Samsung Galaxy Mega 6.3
reviews.author: Lukas I Nyoman Yesaya Cavin Oemint

reviews.title: The Best Emulator for Android
reviews.comment: This app is simply the best DS emulator, and not only for Android, but for every platform. I use the app on a Galaxy S4 and it is super fast, even when removing the frame-skip option. Also, updates and support is lighting fast!
reviews.author: Fernando Chavarria

reviews.title: A Beautiful Emulator!
reviews.comment: Truly the DS Emulator on the market by far. Runs perfectly on my Note 2 with absolutely no lag. However some features I\'d like to see implemented are bluetooth/wi-fi linking, swipe on and off touch controls, perhaps building in a gba/gbc emulator could be considered so its an all in one package, the ability to delete or add buttons when customizing the touch controls, perhaps the addition of a turbo a/b button for the built in touch controls. Keep it up devs!
reviews.author: Dan Freeman

reviews.title: Please fix it
reviews.comment: Now theres a new problem where the game crashes whenever I try to in game save
reviews.author: michael auriemma

reviews.title: It\'s real. It works. Huzzah!
reviews.comment: It works. It really works. If it was possible to somehow get DS ROMs and the binaries, you could really play all those DS games, Pokemon games... Advance Wars... Pokemon games... did I mention Pokemon games.   I would buy it twice just to say thanks to the developer.
reviews.author: Marcus Williamson

reviews.title: It\'s awsome but....
reviews.comment: If only we can link 2 devices so we can trade pokemon. Or trade with the same device between 2 versions of the game. Other than that, this app is perfect!
reviews.author: Andre Aitcheson

reviews.title: AMAZING!!
reviews.comment: Just the perfect app to play DS keep up the good work its totally worth every penny. It only needs WiFi gameplay
reviews.author: Bryan Pena

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: THIS IS JUST THE BEST APP ON GOOGLE PLAY. THANK YOU EXOPHASE FOR MAKING IT POSSIBLE TO PLAY NDS GAMES ON ANDROID
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing this. Is the best
reviews.comment: I will happily support this as long as updates keep coming to make it better. Just wish it was cheaper but to be honest its worth every penny. Keep it up please.
reviews.author: ORY SMITH

reviews.title: Not bad, sir.
reviews.comment: The Marking codes for Pokemon White 2 and Black 2 cause the emulator to close out, but the item codes are back to working normally and there\'s no more lag to the walk through walls code. Keep it up, man. It gets better and better.
reviews.author: Christopher Inostroza

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore
reviews.comment: There is a glitch in the inazuma 11 2 game where it shuts down every time when you get to that point
reviews.author: Christiano Ronaldo

reviews.title: Works better
reviews.comment: Keep.on ur good job  man ..tnx for ur work.
reviews.author: Daniel Silva

reviews.title: Save state
reviews.comment: In game save state became corrupted and load/save state doesnt do anything when you try and load it anymore
reviews.author: Alex Kayias

reviews.title: Good but 4 stars
reviews.comment: Would give it 5 Stars if the start button would work in pokemon based games.
reviews.author: camo Grant
